group_1.textLeft: Um...@All that's left is...

group_1.textRight: ...Iroha, would it be alright...@if we put in some white fish too...?

group_1.textLeft: Of course!@Today is luxury day, after all.
We have to put some ingredients you like in the hot@pot too.

group_1.narration: Luxury day...@It's a day where it's okay if we eat hot pot@with a lot of ingredients at the kotatsu we just pulled out@and eat ice cream while lounging around!
Yachiyo gave us her approval just this once@since we brought out the kotatsu!

group_1.textLeft: What should we have as the last one...

group_1.textRight: It'd taste great, regardless of whether we decide to@put in zosui or udon noodles...!

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm... Well we came all this way.@Should we put both in?
Yeah!@It depends on your tastes, but...
it tastes good if you eat mushy udon noodles and@the rice from the zosui together.
Then let's buy some frozen udon noodles.
I'm pretty sure we had rice frozen in the fridge...@so is this everything?
What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: We haven't bought the ice cream...

group_1.textLeft: Ah!@You're right!
Luxury day can't start unless we buy the ice cream.

group_1.textRight: Ah... look over there...!@There's a lot of different kinds of ice cream here...!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@Sana, what do you like?
This one, right?

group_1.textRight: Ah, b-but... it's okay...@...since they're all expensive...

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to worry about that.

group_1.textRight: B-but... won't she get mad at us...?

group_1.textLeft: Eh...?@[chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:100151:motion_301][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]...Ahh, hmmm...
(True, seeing how frugal Yachiyo normally is does@make me nervous about this, but...)
Ahh! There's matcha flavored ice cream by the same maker...!
Yachiyo loves matcha, so if we buy this we should be okay!
Yeah!@Besides, it's luxury day, right?
Maybe I'll have the vanilla flavored one by this@maker.
*Giggle*
Let's pick Felicia and Tsuruno's too.

group_1.textRight: Haaaah! Man, I really ate!@That hot pot was really good!

group_1.textLeft: Hey!@You're supposed to say "thanks for the meal", right?
Yes.@Thank you for the meal.

group_1.textRight: Now, now then, Iroha!@It's time for the much anticipated...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!@Ice cream, right?
[chara:100202:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]----!?@T-this is...!

group_1.textRight: If it were Yachiyo, she wouldn't've picked these.

group_1.textLeft: Y-Yachiyo...!@You see...

group_1.textRight: After all, today is luxury day.@We have to treat ourselves once in a while, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.textRight: However, Felicia.@You said a bit more than you should have.

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno, yours is the kyoho grape flavored one!@It's your favorite, right?

group_1.textRight: Then, is mine the matcha flavored one?

group_1.textLeft: That's right!

group_1.textRight: ...Mine is the strawberry milk flavored one and@Iroha's is vanilla...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, Felicia, you'll eat any kind of ice cream,
but this ice cream looks like cowskin, doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100502:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]From now on, my favorite's gonna be cookies and cream!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@Then, let's eat!

group_1.narration: It'd be nice if...@these special days where nothing really happens@would last forever...
